text: (cheerful music)
(child giggling)

♪ Lights, lights, let's
turn off the lights ♪

♪ Yes, yes, yes, I will
turn off the lights ♪
♪ Good, good, a helpful thing to do ♪
♪ Yay, yay, yay, I like it too ♪
(child giggling)
♪ See, see, Teddy turns off the lights ♪

♪ One, two, three, he
flips the switch, you see ♪

♪ Yes, yes, yes, I'll
turn that off for now ♪
♪ Helping the Earth, I like it, wow ♪
(children giggling)
♪ Trash, trash, let's pick up the trash ♪

♪ Yes, yes, yes, I will
pick up the trash ♪
♪ Good, good, a helpful thing to do ♪
♪ Yay, yay, yay, I like it too ♪
(child giggling)
♪ See, see, elephant cleans the trash ♪

♪ One, two, three, he
picks it up, you see ♪

♪ Yes, yes, yes, I'll
pick it up right now ♪

♪ We're helping the
Earth, I like it, wow ♪
(child giggling)
♪ Water, water, let's turn off the water ♪

♪ Yes, yes, yes, I will
turn off the water ♪
♪ Good, good, a helpful thing to do ♪
♪ Yay, yay, yay, I like it too ♪
(both giggling)
♪ See, see, monkey turns off the water ♪

♪ One, two, three, he
twists the knob, you see ♪

♪ Yes, yes, yes, I'll
turn it off right now ♪
♪ Helping the Earth, I like it, wow. ♪
(children giggling)

♪ Plastic, plastic,
let's reuse our plastic ♪

♪ Yes, yes, yes, I will
reuse the plastic ♪
♪ Good, good, a helpful thing to do ♪
♪ Yay, yay, yay, I like it too ♪
♪ See, see, mousey reuses the plastic ♪
♪ One, two, three, use it again, you see ♪

♪ Yes, yes, yes, I'll
reuse the plastic now ♪
♪ Helping the Earth, I like it, wow ♪
(children giggling)
♪ Tree, tree, it's time to plant a tree ♪
♪ Yes, yes, yes, we want to plant a tree ♪
♪ Good, good, a helpful thing to do ♪
♪ Yay, yay, yay, we like it too ♪
(all chuckling)
♪ See, see, Teddy plants the tree ♪

♪ One, two, three, in
the ground, you see ♪

♪ Yes, yes, yes, we'll
plant the tree right now ♪

♪ We're helping the
Earth, we like it, wow ♪
(all laughing)
